Question
========

Below is the (incomplete) ANOVA table of a CRD-ANOVA (Completely Randomized Design ANOVA), which was performed on data that were collected from 16 individuals divided into 4 groups.

  --------------- ----- ---- ---- ----- Source of variation SS df MS F Among groups 8.0 Within groups 60 12 Total 180 --------------- ----- ---- ---- -----

When we have compared the population averages pairwise using. the LSD test, and we want to apply a Bonferroni correction, then the risk per test is obtained by the total risk

Answerlist
----------

* Dividing by 4
* Multiply by 4
* Divide by 6
* Multiply by 6

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Divide by 4: Incorrect
* Multiply by 4: Incorrect
* Divide by 6: Correct
* Multiply by 6: Incorrect
